entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is mentioned as the Special Correspondent in the article.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as a student who is being talked about by Malfoy.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is mentioned as the one who shows Harry an article about Hagrid.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned in the article with a picture of him looking shifty.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is mentioned as the Headmaster of Hogwarts who made a controversial staff appointment.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Mad-Eye Moody is mentioned as an ex-Auror who was hired by Dumbledore to teach Defense Against the Dark Arts.

relationships.description: Rita Skeeter writes about Albus Dumbledore's decision to hire Mad-Eye Moody.
Draco Malfoy shows an article about Hagrid to Harry Potter.
